source.name: EPA's Energy News Site
source.description: Energy use is a part of everyone's daily routine. However, the generation and use of energy can affect the environment. Our regulatory and voluntary programs foster more responsible production and use of energy resources. This Web site enables you to review EPA press releases about energy-related topics.
